review: They keep pushing this release back. Now it's Feb 1st. Can they just not keep up with the demands? Been wanting once since November.
author: Gary J Meulemans

review: Fun interface and a lot of fun apps and movie stations.
author: Eric L Carpenter

review: I Knew I would like the Fire Stick, but it is a great program. Made the TV a smart system.
author: Joyce A Rogers

review: It was vary nice and quick the only thing I would like to be able to marrow from my Pendleton it the wee network.
author: bertrandjohnson

review: The stick is great!! So easy to use .Great options Very happy with another great Amazon product!!!!
author: Jeanne

review: It is easy to use and aesthetically pleasing. I am enjoying using the many features it includes, like the child protection password for movie purchases. I prefer using the Fire TV stick over my blu-ray player even though they both have similar features (Netflix, games). I find the Fire TV stick more accessible.
author: MJgui

review: It was easy to set up. Initially I had a problem loading movies but after I unplugged it for a minute it worked fine.
author: Linda C. Harlan

review: It is awesome and works like a charm with my Vizio 39 inch hdtvWas able to use the yupp tv app with this
author: Chandrasekar
